# 8-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 8-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_uchar1**: A vector of one 8-bit unsigned integer element.
- **simd_uchar2**: A vector of two 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uchar3**: A vector of three 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uchar4**: A vector of four 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uchar8**: A vector of eight 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uchar16**: A vector of sixteen 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uchar32**: A vector of thirty-two 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_uchar64**: A vector of sixty-four 8-bit unsigned integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_uchar2**: A packed vector of two 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uchar4**: A packed vector of four 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uchar8**: A packed vector of eight 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uchar16**: A packed vector of sixteen 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uchar32**: A packed vector of thirty-two 8-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_packed_uchar64**: A packed vector of sixty-four 8-bit unsigned integer elements.

## Unsigned Integer Vectors

- **16-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 16-bit integer elements.
- **32-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 32-bit integer elements.
- **64-Bit Unsigned Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain unsigned 64-bit integer elements.
